name: Treasure of Cutuma 3rd: Family Doctor
description: Short adventure game with third person point of view. The game is a free add-on for the base game.

name: Soul of Phantasm
description: Sin descripción

name: Hero Mission
description: Sin descripción

name: Deep of the Ocean
description: Sin descripción

name: Kung Fu Pets
description: Sin descripción

name: Annihilation Mobile
description: Sin descripción

name: Covid-19 (Corona Virus)
description: Do you have what it takes to perform everyday tasks and curve balls life gives you to survive this quarantine? If you do you will get out this quarantine successfully and life will go back to normal.

name: Semester Begins! Xiaomi
description: "The Chinese 80s" is a game that simulates the daily life and learning of Chinese post-80s pupils. Take you to experience China in the 1980s and show the living environment and state of learning, culture and entertainment in the 1980s.

name: SF2K: Class Dismissed
description: Delve into social gameplay like no other, playing with tenuous alliances and bitter rivalries on the harshest battlefield know to humans - the schoolyard playground. Who can you REALLY trust?

name: Tunguska: A Call in the Woods
description: Make your way through dense Siberian woods in search of a missing person in this path-finding survival adventure. Compass and map included.

name: Daggan
description: A sexy furry game where you reproduce to make big armies and build cities.

name: Blues and Bullets: Episode 2
description: Blues and Bullets is a dark and violent crime thriller. Set in an alternative Eliot Ness & Al Capone story, Blues and Bullets blends a stunning script with detective work to deliver an amazing interactive experience.

name: Gravity Square
description: Part-time work urgently needed! Beginners welcome! Manipulate the gravity of the planet Square and earn your wages by collecting the many aliens that spring up! Compete for income with other part time worker from around the world!

name: Mr.King Luo! Don't Be Kidding: Chapter 2
description: Chapter 2 is a free DLC that includes all new chapters and stages. It also has a new Boss Rush Mode and includes a digital artbook.

name: Thru
description: A thru-hiking roguelite adventure

name: HaunTD
description: The game of haunted contraptions.

name: Street Legal: Revision
description: Take the STREET ACTION to the next level, in this loving re-release of the 2002 bargain-bin classic! Featuring over 1000 unique swappable parts, 16 detailed vehicles to tune, race, destroy and maintain, a large city to unlock, and much more, now with plenty of fixes and improvements!

name: Habitat
description: The corporate space race begins! An Adventure/Survival/Farming game where you need to manage resources while exploring the planet and interacting with ancient alien artifacts in order to change the climate, survive the seasonal elements, evade enemies and stack up on Doge to conquer a new world

name: Smelted Kin
description: Science fiction 2D shooter with platformer and metroidvania elements. Players will have to explore a huge research complex consisting of nonlinear levels, which is crowded with robots

name: Andarilho: Aliens
description: Survive among aliens!

name: Witches vs. Demons
description: Witches Vs. Demons is a Rage Dungeon Crawler based around using SteamVR to build an immersive gameplay experience. The first edition of Witches Vs. Demons will have 10 playable levels, unique boss encounters with raid mechanics for single players, & scaling difficulty into multiplayer content.

name: World Order
description: World order is revolutionary sci-fi real-time strategy, the main feature of which are modular units

name: SideTracked!
description: An online co-op and pvp adventure action RPG focused around community, socializing, and adventure. In a world infested with a mysterious fog, turn yourself into a hero!

name: Core Alpha
description: Core Alpha is an arcade first-person shooter, which is made in the best traditions of old-school shooters. Fight and defeat hordes of zombies, as well as destroy infected cores to fight the main enemy.

name: Timescape: Altitude
description: The pilots are gone, You are locked to a seat, and have been left to die on a plane. Best to get out, as quickly as possible. Solve a series of puzzles to escape and jump to safety. You will need all your wits on this mission.

name: Alpha One
description: Alpha One is a turn based strategy game with real time encounters. Each action level is a turn in a strategic conflict to survive or defeat your opponent. Race to collect resources, acquire upgrades, expand territory and economy, build defenses, all to defeat the enemy or escape home.

name: Holiday Cheer 3
description: Explore a Christmas decorated Victorian house with 100 levels of match 3 game play for hours of relaxing entertainment in this atmosphere filled Christmas themed Match 3 game. Escape into this puzzling winter wonderland this christmas.

name: World Of Stalkers
description: World Of Stalkers is an exciting online first-person shooter, Stalker-style, in which you have to fight the strongest Stalkers of Cordona. An unforgettable multiplayer experience awaits you in the Exclusion Zone, where not only skill and accuracy, but also the ability to play as a team, decides.

name: Soul Dream: Undesired Shift
description: Evan and Aviary have been cast into the Undesired Reality, where unknown forces prevent them from returning to their reality. Confronted by two mysterious figures and assailed by monsters, Evan and Aviary must fight and determine the truth of the Undesired Reality

name: The Madhouse: Kansen Yashiki
description: The Madhouse | Kansen Yashiki is a survival horror game. Contains Fear, Stealth, Exploration/Puzzle solving, Item management. Moreover "Multiple first-person views" provides a new level of fear, immersion, strategy. Steal the vision of "something" lurking in the abandoned house and try to survive.

name: Gênese
description: An interactive experience of creating entire stellar systems, planets and civilizations, playing as the supreme God of this Universe. Build colossal worlds from molecules. Evolve advanced civilizations from simple bacteria. Experience an amazing, rich and detailed gameplay, writing your own story.

name: Starship
description: Destroy your enemies, dodge asteroids, upgrade your ship and improve your skill in this 2D rogue space shooter !

name: Dance like a butterfly, Shot like a Bee!
description: The steampunk and biological indie game!

name: Necromancer's Gift
description: Necromancer's Gift is a Monster tamer sprinkled with roguelike elements like permadeath and procedurally-generated maps. Capture and face creatures in turn-based battles as you attempt to rescue your dog from a Necromancer that hates humans.

name: SwapOut
description: A roguelike FPS game, focusing on gun customization and fast gameplay. Survive the zombie apocalypse, and possibly end it.

name: Code of the Savage
description: Inspired by the classics from the 80s and 90s - Code of the Savage is a western RPG with a heavy emphasis on exploration and NPC interaction. It features a large, seamless open world to explore. There is a focus on player freedom and the consequences that go along with that.

name: Delicious Fruitworld
description: Delicious Fruitworld is a classic jump 'n' run platformer where the goal is to complete each level with as many points as possible.Points are awarded for fruits distributed in the world and for a good time in which the level was passed. Share your score!

name: Seed of Agony
description: Grow an army of demons aboard the living ship, the Seed of Agony, and use them to conquer an infinite, procedurally generated galaxy, in this new take on the 4x genre.

name: Midnight Blues
description: Smash, slash, and shoot your way to freedom through the bloody criminal underworld of a dark, future New York. Midnight Blues features fast-paced, unforgiving combat that will tug at your nerves until every man but you is dead.

name: Cat Capacity
description: A crazy cat lady simulator.

name: Traffic Chase
description: Road racing game. Beep at any traffic driver to start the race! Connect more drivers at any time! Earn money on road races, tune or buy a new car, participate in more racing events. Keep on racing!

name: Clash of the Metal
description: Hyper Mecha Anime Manga Fighting Unleashed! Clash of the Metal introduces the mecha combat league in a glorious 2D anime styled arcade action fighting game..

name: Running Water
description: You are a "Runner" known as subject #0076101, created out of water by a tyrannical A.I. that runs the facility. During testing an error occurs and you are released unexpectedly into the basement where you must run, jump, climb and fight for your freedom using the tools found along the way.

name: Void of Space
description: Void of Space is an RPG, horror-survival game, a science fiction adventure. Explore the colonizer ship Genesis IV, abandoned in the atmosphere of an unknown alien planet. Craft items, find weapons and equipment to defend against the hostile life forms you encounter.

name: Endocrisis Hyperactive
description: Endocrisis Hyperactive the next top-down shoot em up with intense action. Absorb bullets to increment your power and get new weapons. Pass through levels with a lot of enemies and bullets and, of course, intense boss battles

name: Against Ether
description: A fantasy RPG with music based fights where you will help a young girl to change the fate of the world!

name: Alchemist's Mountain
description: Alchemist's Mountain is a dungeon solving, adventure platformer rendered in hi-bit pixel art. It tells a heartwarming story of courage and endearing characters, looking to find their place in a world of magic and science.

name: Bravest Burden
description: You must protect the last light in a world of darkness. Bravest Burden is a cooperative, multiplayer RPG. In order to survive this brutal world, you will need to look out for each other during your treacherous adventures.

name: Poly Racing
description: Poly Racing is a low poly casual racing game that for some reason is really fun to drift in. Pick and paint whatever car you like, and just have fun drifting and jumping around. And Poly Racing, early access or not, is going to be a community driven game.

name: Dragon Trails
description: Create a party of four adventurers and set forth down the Dragon Trails to defeat the vicious dragons wreaking havoc across the land! When you fail, create a new party, find your failed attempts, and loot their items so you can go farther down the trails!

name: Queen of Zarkov
description: 'Queen of Zarkov' is an 'indie-3rd-person-shooter' that combines elements of 'Escape from Tarkov' with zombies. Embark on missions and loot everything you can, while surviving against different types of zombies and other deadly threats. All your Equipment will be lost if you die, so try to survive!

name: Ghost Terminator
description: Let's vanish some ghosts! Explore, shoot, run, throw grenades, have some fun and get a little scared. Your mission is to find and annihilate all the ghosts.

name: Far Sector
description: All that matters is that you're a spaceship captain. Your objective is to explore the far sector. Build, develop, and research. Get to the bottom of the targets of your mission and find out the truth of what happened before it.

name: Wide Open
description: 'Wide Open' was born out of a love for old-school, top-down racing games. We've done our part to make it fresh and set it apart from the rest. With a fully deformable terrain, you can be sure that no lap will be like the last. There are many terrain types like asphalt, dirt, sand, mud, and more!

name: Nanocorp
description: Fight back against the Nanocorp corporation in this cyberpunk RTS. As you discover their evil machinations, you decide to take a stand for humanity. Forget about saving the world, can you even save yourself?

name: Project Scav
description: Naki is a hardcore singleplayer 1st/3rd person shooter with parkour mechanics. Post-Apocalypse, stylized, scavenging, realistic weapons, crafting, character customization, weapon customization.

name: Gladiator of sparta
description: A classic addictive/fun indie mini game for windows that you will play every time!. Do you ever wonder what is like to be in a realistic combat arena and how it feel? Play as Octavius , the greek warrior who is forced to fight in the gladiatorial arenas with many of the best soldiers in the empire..

name: Mandeshire
description: Mandeshire is an RPG game about the struggles of our hero Mandeshire, who wants to save the tribes of the north from the servants of Erlik Khan. This game is inspired by features, events, and characters from Turkish Mythology, Mandeshire and Erlik Khan.

name: The Judgement of Q
description: In an alternate reality, using a keyboard and a mouse, despite the danger of dissolving to nothing again, the player chose to transform potential into actuality, in a space of possibility he will try every key and every combination of keys until he forms an ultimate map of this new reality.

name: The Age of Gods Return
description: Behind the people and law of elementary physics,there are transcendental law instigator protect this world and pointer space which store the souls of everyone.

name: Warriors & Mages
description: You Play as the main character and travel to different villages and complete different quests while trying to save the king.

name: Dice vs Dice
description: Roll, Roll, Roll. This is all you have and all you can. Fight the High Lord and his armies with your dice. Believe the luck you have or calculate the chances.

name: Defend the Fort
description: 2D topdown zombie survival shooter, build defences, survive the waves of zombies

name: Space Endeavor
description: Space Endeavor is an Action Shooter Game.

name: Stellar War
description: Sin descripción

name: The Last War
description: The Last War is an online multiplayer shooter where are you try to kill the opposite team with your friends, after you kill so many call And a kill streak and see what happens, customize your weapons and play a lot game modes.

name: BuriBoard
description: Join the ride and help us make BuriBoard a renowned fingerboarding simulator by purchasing the early access today!

name: History Table: Lore & Quiz
description: Take a trip through time and learn more about the main events and people of world history with the History Table: Lore & Quiz!

name: Pipeline VR
description: Pipeline VR is a hectic virtual reality puzzle game, that pits you against a rising tide of torrential water. With the residents of Pipesville in desperate need for plumbers, can YOU solve their plumbing emergencies?

name: Unawake
description: Unawakens is a melee first person action adventure game in a surreal realm which combines ancient history and fantasy together. Live your journey beyond the battlefields of the Fallen Angels and the giant Unawakens. The Eternal War continues!

name: Jericho's Rose
description: Help the little ghost Jericho explore an ancient temple in the middle of the desert, so it can bring a rare flower to its grandma. Find a variety of magical trinkets and unexpected companions to help you solve the mysteries of the temple's maze-like corridors.

name: Astrd
description: ASTRD is an arcade roguelike shooter where you build & upgrade your ship that automatically attacks asteroids and enemies. Combine different blocks to unlock class bonuses and create endless unique configurations, to face endless waves of varied enemies in this 3D bullet-hell game.

name: March! March!
description: March! March! is a turn-based duel game with a puzzle-based combat system. Each turn your army gets a regiment that varies in formation and size. You only have a few seconds to decide where your soldiers fit best. Tell your units where to march! march! and they will do the rest.

name: Castle Siege
description: An asymmetric 1v1 tower defense/offense multiplayer game set in a fantasy medieval setting. Attack or defend the castle. Level up, and use magical spell cards to gain an advantage.

name: Gga
description: 《GGA》是一款MOBA类电子竞技俱乐部模拟经营游戏，目标是带领战队夺得冠军！

name: Disposable heroes 2 : The curse that killed a queen
description: 4 new heroes are needed when when an evil sorceress queen and her army of soldiers spread fear and destruction across the lands

name: Capture the Flag 1
description: A casual, family friendly capture the flag multiplayer game that brings nostalgia to anyone who played the team based game as a child. Who would've thought that back-to-back juking and defensive play would be so fun! Add to your Wishlist now & be ready for some satisfyingly amusing 5v5 action!

name: Incarnata: Dormant Stories
description: Incredible depth, within an infinite world. Dive into this adventure simulation and become everything you decide to be. The game adapts and builds challenges, creates unique characters, places, and goals for you to weave your own story.

name: Scp: Breakout
description: In SCP: Breakout, spawn as a lowly D-Class that has been granted their one chance to escape, team up with other players or go it alone as you take on the facility at its worst. In the midst of a catastrophic breach, will you survive?

name: Trazz
description: Welcome to Trazz! This is a casual, chill-out arcade game inspired by old popular brick breaker games like Arkanoid or Breakout. Lots of levels, weird power ups and upgrades.

name: Abh
description: This is a psychological thriller game set in the 1990's, you wake up in a strange house and must search the house for a way out, if that is how your story will end. There will be some jumpscares.

name: Cyberpunk 2077: Vincent Sin Edition
description: This edition includes the following Vincent's Socks, Game Discs with Case, World Compendium Detailing the Game's Setting and Lore, Postcards from Night City, Map of Night City, Stickers, Game Soundtrack (Download), Art booklet featuring a selection of art from the game (Download), Cyberpunk 2020 sourcebook (Download), Wallpapers for desktop and mobile (Download), "GANGS OF CYBERPUNK" Woven Badges

name: Utawarerumono: Prelude to the Fallen - Origins Edition
description: For the first time ever, the origins of the Utawarerumono saga are coming overseas! Prelude to the Fallen follows the story of a man with no memories who awakens in a strange world and is taken in by a tribe of kindhearted beast folk. He is raised as one of their own, eventually earning the name “Hakuoro.” When neighboring nations begin to encroach on his homeland, Hakuoro rises up against the tyrannical invaders, setting himself on an unforgettable journey that lives on in the songs of legend.

name: NHL 17: Deluxe Edition
description: All-new game modes, new and deeper experiences in fan-favorite modes, and the best on-ice gameplay ever make NHL 17 the most exciting EA SPORTS NHL game to date.

name: Crown Trick: Limited Edition
description: Crown Trick features unique synchronous turn-based combat so that enemies and deadly traps only react when the player does. As Elle, a combination of skills, magical Familiar skills, weapons, and strategic thinking is required to escape the labyrinthian procedural dungeons of the Nightmare Realm alive.

name: Headmaster: Extra Time Edition
description: You are a professional soccer player, but not a good one.

name: Euro Fishing: Collector's Edition
description: Welcome to the Great Indoors!

name: Severed Steel: Digital Deluxe Edition
description: The Severed Steel Digital Deluxe Edition includes the full game, official soundtrack & digital art book. Soundtrack: Features 59 tracks, including 15 previously unreleased bonus songs. Artbook: Full of concept sketches, storyboards, in-game imagery & more.

name: Dice Legacy: Deluxe Edition
description: Dice Legacy Deluxe Edition includes the wonderful original soundtrack that accompanies you throughout the game. Build a settlement and explore the ringworld in this dice-based survival city-builder.

name: Red Goes Faster
description: In Red Goes Faster, players take control of an aspiring young racer named Leon Garcia. Leon is a racer who takes part in intergalactic races by day and explores his home planet of Keplar at night. Players spend their time between races hanging out with Leon's friends in a variety of establishments while finding themselves trying to untangle a complicated love triangle.

name: Vengeance is Mine
description: Vengeance Is Mine’s, brutal melee mech combat is augmented with a time-manipulation mechanic that adds a fascinating twist to encounters. Thanks to the capabilities of the HYDRA mech suit, the player will have the ability to speed up time and blink towards unsuspecting enemies, or rewind time to readjust combos or evade death. HYDRA also comes packing an energy-based projectile weapon that allows you to take on foes at distance.

name: Tamale Loco: Rumble in the Desert
description: Sin descripción

name: Collapse of Magic
description: Collapse of Magic is a challenging grid-based tactical RPG focused on pure strategy and minimal RNG.

name: Polar Explorer Simulator
description: Live a few days of an "ordinary" polar explorer and overcome all the difficulties. You can play alone or as a team. The more polar friends you have with you, the easier it is. But there can be a strictly limited number of polar explorers at one polar station.

name: The Dawning
description: The Dawning is a first-person puzzle mystery game. Play as Detective Madison as he searches 7 beautifully crafted areas for clues to catch a killer. Use stealth to sneak past deadly enemies. Solve complex puzzles to access new areas, progress the rich storyline, and obtain key items.

name: Catching a Ride
description: Drive at night seeing the road only through the light of other cars, in this tiny adventure about feeling lost, and making friends along the way.

name: Ship Simulator Realistic
description: Ship Simulator Realistic experience the real simulation. The game will be based on a free roam aspect to explore the Greece Scenery in a physics based game , realistic handling and many more features.

name: Iron Age
description: Iron Age is a First-person dungeon crawler set in a Sci-Fi Fantasy world with Realtime melee combat.

name: Drinks Company Tycoon
description: Begin your own company story. Combine ingredients and categories to create your product. Vary the price and the taste. Build your image. Advance the technology. Adjust to market and customer needs, but dont forget about rivals. All of this and even more is waiting for you in Drinks Company Tycoon.

name: Golf Together
description: Play Golf Together with your friends in this versatile mini golf game. Over the local area network, online or on your own. Choose from different modes and create your own levels with a extensive feature packed level editor.

name: Space Reign
description: An indie space-sim and strategy game featuring ship and fleet combat mixed with management of a private space corporation. Claim sectors for your faction and raise its influence in the near-future, where resource exploiting corporations are in a state of constant conflict over territory control.

name: Grand Attrition
description: Grand Attrition is a chaotic experimental strategy game where you can take control of everything in battles, from the existing terrain to enemy units. Survive attritions, detailed to the specifications of your choosing, and earn talent points to increase the chaos.

name: King's Helper
description: Have you ever wondered what the King's life is like? King's Helper is an extraordinary FPP game in which you have a chance to become his right hand. Travel back to the Middle Ages and assume the role of the King's helper.

name: Bunny Jewel Match Adventure
description: Bunny Jewel Match Adventure - The new match 3 game is here, with brilliant jewels in over 600 dazzling puzzles! A magical journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap jewels to clear the way, and match pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.

name: Story of Nararale
description: Story of Nararale is an RPG Strategy Turn-based game set in fantasy world that focus on managing party and fighting tactics.

name: Next Generation Soccer Coach
description: coming in WWC Qatar 2022

name: Nextera
description: Near-future VTOL simulator

name: Witchfall: Secrets of Emotica
description: Welcome to the world of Witchfall, a magical land filled with adventure! Play as five adorable critters: Koemi, Rez, Maya, Sloberg or Envel as they embark on a perilous journey to stop the evil Professor Flitz from stealing the mysterious Emotica Shards.

name: Survive the Story
description: Fight, explore, and survive. Find out what happened. And let the others know.

name: Typer Hero
description: Typer Hero is a typing game with two different difficulty modes, however survive mode will only appear once you have completed the game.

name: Revel
description: Revel is a fun and original suit-based card game that will test your skills and instincts. Stepping out of the shadows of blackjack and poker, Revel will give you unprecedented ways to play such as buying cards and dynamic card values. Will you pin down its elusive optimal strategy?

name: Mystery at Morgoth
description: Who is behind the evil events that unfurled in Feldar Vale? Journey to the land of Morgoth to halt the dark force that terrorizes the people and learn who is behind the mysterious Cabal. An adventure for 4-6 characters of Level 1-6, loosely based on Dungeons & Dragons Open Game License (OGL 1e/2e).

name: Storms 2
description: Set in an ancient world, Storms 2 combines action, progression, and loot, with generated worlds to explore. Character and loot choices change up the game as you try to find your way home.

name: Blood Impact
description: Fight for your escape from this mysterious lab. Use your blood powers to achieve your goal in this action adventure game! But don’t forget, blood is vital...

name: Killer Gin Bros
description: Harken back to the old school platformers! Heavily inspired by an Arcade Classic, use attacks, powers, and advanced tactics to eliminate enemies or your friends! Win by collecting 5 coins or being the last man standing! One thing is for sure, skills pay the bills!

name: Halloween Puzzle
description: Halloween Puzzle is an educational game for children in which you have to collect a picture from puzzles. The game has 12 levels, a pleasant atmosphere for children.Good music, nice graphics, mouse control, the game develops memory well.

name: Jurassic Snap
description: Congratulations photographer , you have been selected for the mission on Gliese 486B . In order to study the creatures similar to the dinosaurs that live there, you will take pictures of them and we will study their behavior. So we will see if humans are able to cohabit.

name: Horror Maze
description: A Tense, Terrifying series of mazes.

name: Rocket Sword
description: Rocket Sword is a ridiculous, gratuitous slash-'em-up where you are the projectile: a rocket-propelled greatsword. Slice, stab, and pulverize everyone in your path with the most powerful weapon in the universe.

name: Potata: Foxy Tale
description: Potata: Foxy Tale is a fairy tale themed platformer adventure game in a beautiful world of dark forests. Your goal is to restore the balance and assemble the fragments of the Woodland Spirit.

name: Road Gangs Simulator
description: Become a gangsta in the Road Gangs Simulator. Dive into a mix of the strategy and the TPS genre. Control each member of the gang, assault other gangs or even rob a bank! Wanna be the bad guy? Wishlist now and own the city!

name: Absurd Chess
description: Compete against up to 100 players in various, REALLY absurd chess modes never seen before! You will have to adapt to new rules and develop your own tactics that will allow you to dominate the board.

name: Pax Narcotica: Trafficker
description: Become a cartel boss and take over the US drug trade. Build smuggling networks across the country and negotiate sales with crime groups. Recruit soldiers to protect your shipments and expand your territory. Bribe police and politicians to protect your interests and disrupt your rivals.

name: Short Hop Laser
description: Take the short hop laser concept from SSBM, and make it a 2d side scroller arcade game. Actually don't do that, because I already did that.

name: Bainok: City of Fighters
description: Combat men and monsters in this turn-based martial art rpg, while you try to live day by day in the dystopian metropolis of Cirqualo.

name: Alec Adventure
description: Alec Adventure is a casual 2D pixel platformer. Shoot your crossbow as you travel through different environments fighting many different enemies. Find your way back home with items you find and don't forget to enjoy the view on the way!

name: Warlocks Entanglement
description: Warlocks Entanglement puts you into a destructible open world in a magical medieval setting. Explore and learn all this world has to offer and then open a gateway to the next world!.

name: The Steps of Divynia
description: Fight tainted beasts and uncover magic as Eustera transforms from the mundane to the unknown. Carve out your destiny as Aldyia in a tale about courage and holding to your beliefs. Is the past worth not knowing, or does it deserve to be remembered? Find out in this storybook 2D platforming adventure.

name: Spinner Invaders
description: Shoot your way through a thrilling action adventure of 120 waves in 4 different game modes while fighting against waves of enemies and 12 extreme bosses. Save the world from The General by yourself or with a friend locally and play 10 different Challenges.

name: The Last Cadet
description: The Last Cadet is a deep sea action-driven metroidvania with elements of dread and isolation. Play one of two single player campaigns using twin-stick controls to escape a submarine sunk by an ancient monster. Also featuring two local co-op multiplayer modes at launch.

name: Unknown Path
description: Rogue-like shooter about trains in the steampunk atmosphere of the future.

name: Demolition Game
description: This is a simple game

name: Stoneheart
description: Adventure awaits in this RPG, with action, survival, crafting and base-building! Arriving in new lands, far from known civilization and with only a mysterious pendant, you will determine your own path. Will you survive the epic quest for the Stoneheart?

name: Mythic: Forest Warden
description: An action game where you play as a forest`s pagan god in the WW II times. Use god`s magic, brute force, sharp claws, and Nazi`s weapons to drive Germans away from your land.

name: The VanMan
description: this game is made by one person and will be uppdated irregulary

name: Solo Royale
description: Solo Royale is an offline, single-player battle royale game. It is a fast-paced battle royale, getting the player immediately into the action. Solo Royale also has a gulag game mode, where the player faces off in a single-elimination 1v1.

name: Sinless Night
description: A small horror story in the style of old video films, telling about the terrible events that the main character of the game faced, who got a part-time job in a diner.

name: The Facility Project
description: An epic horror adventure crafted with a strong focus on atmosphere and story. Explore the environments of an abandoned facility, solving its mystery. Action taking place in the year 2006, play as a private investigator tasked to obtain information about the strange activities that were rumored.

name: Fighties 2
description: Fighties 2 is a fast paced 2D platform fighter. It is the second Fighties game.

name: Uniborne
description: You play as a unicorn assassin. You must execute your mission through your skills of stealth and violence. Being as quick as you can to reach your exit location to be extracted via magical rainbow tractor beams.

name: Treffen
description: Treffen is a game about boxing. Become the master of the sport of boxing, destroy your opponents, take revenge on your main enemy and take back your girlfriend.

name: VR Great Rome City
description: This is a VR leisure travel game for visiting ancient Rome. Players can visit the ancient Roman arena and other scenes.

name: Leshy
description: Leshy is a hack'n'slash game based in the near future, in which the player takes the role of a forest guardian from the Slavic mythology. Fight ruthless humans that invade your home - the primeval forest. Face the enemy's world fueled by modern technology and evil motivations.

name: Last Minute
description: You find yourself in a difficult situation, tired of all the city-life and decided that it’s for the best if you move into a camp in the woods with the friend you love the most – Ozzy. What adventures await you?

name: Doomsday Defense
description: The end of the world is coming, face the endless attacking zombies, please live to the end...

name: Maison Rouge
description: This is a story about an ordinary person living during the economic crisis in France. The country is on the verge of revolution. The main character will have to choose which side to take. Lead a rebellion or defend the honor of a king.

name: Mech Mind Ninja
description: Here, your choices have consequences. Embark in a Time Travel Ninja Tale with multiple routes. Isao is a member of a Brotherhood from the Meiji Era in Japan who travels between the XXII and XIX centuries. What would be your choices on this journey? Make your choices and discover the consequences.

name: Storage Chase
description: Help the furry creature stay alive and overcome all obstacles in this challenging and dynamic 2D platformer - Storage Chase!

name: Project Create
description: Gain experience and level up in this voxel sandbox world as you travel through space and time. Craft equipment and recipes to help you survive the treacherous landscape and sculpt it into your own masterpiece!

name: Three in a Rogue
description: Three in a Rogue is a tactical turn-based three in a row roguelike. Cascade combos to fight monsters and explore a randomly generated dungeon.

name: Mannaz
description: Simultaneous resolution turn-based PvP combat game about battles between wizard schools. New combat mechanics, spell fusion, infinite customization and team management options, making each combat totally different from the previous one.

name: Catsploration
description: An adventure, a difficult 3d platformer, and an exploration of imaged scenes. Cat.

name: Save Yourself!
description: A burning skyscraper, a sinking ship, or a meteor shower – use your wits and everything that comes in handy, in order to save yourself from extremely perilous catastrophes. Save yourself!

name: Haunted Shores
description: Haunted Shores is a Single-player horror game where you are an investigative journalist of the paranormal, travelling to different locations confirming or debunking the tales of each. No guns, knifes or axes... just you against myth.

name: Paper Bum
description: A feral dog tries to survive in a hostile world. The dog doesn’t trust anyone and maybe there is a reason for that. There are two ways: to become a wolf or to give people a chance. Paper Bum is a dark adventure resembling a sad child’s drawings.

name: Do I Feel?
description: You are a trapped nameless hero in a grim world that has been distorted by corrupted feelings. Fight back! Dive into a 2D hand-drawn story-rich platformer, mixing exploration and action. In this short journey, you need to pass through the darkest side of this strange world and ask: do I feel?

name: Pale Roots
description: Work. Earn money. Pay for survival. Speak with crazy characters as tragedy unfolds. You have sixteen weeks before the town ends.

name: Victor
description: A third person gladiator fighting game, in which you defeat waves of enemies to claim victory

name: Evolution Tag 2
description: A unique twist on the MOBA genre, incorporating elements of RTS, survival, and cat and mouse style gameplay. Evolve, survive, build bases, control armies, and fight other players in an intense 10vs5 match between humans and the undead.

name: My name is Velcro
description: My name is Velcro is a hardcore platformer. You play as a piece of dirt named Velcro. The goal of the game is to grab the ceiling with the web and move on. There are several types of traps. You are also forbidden to touch any edges.

name: I am Magicami
description: Action-RPG for your smartphone, released in Japan.

name: Mr. Sleepy Man
description: In Mr. Sleepy Man, you play as a sleepy guy who's up way past his bedtime and out of control! Make a mess of everything you find and turn Bedtime Town against you! This sandbox adventure is filled with comical hijinks, outrageous characters, and platforming action!

name: Fallen City Brawl
description: Brawl through the city in hard-hitting pixel art style inspired by arcade classics! Inspired by arcade beat ’em ups of the late ’80s and early ’90s, Fallen City Brawl is a story of ambition and revenge told through intense side-scrolling pixel art action.

name: Here Comes the Hero
description: 1 on 1 action roguelike game where you fight through a randomly generated path filled with villains and events until you defeat the final boss.

name: Xenocider
description: Blast through corrupted worlds in this HD remaster of a cult classic! Xenocider is a third-person rail shooter inspired by arcade classics and presented in nostalgic 32-bit style!

name: Pollito & Xiang Xiang: Adventure in the Forest
description:
Pollito & Xiang Xiang: Adventure in the Forest is a family friendly adventure with RPG elements game, where you can control two characters (in single player or in online coop-multiplayer modes)

Your goal is to save the creatures of the planet while getting resources (paw coins) to fix your ship, improve your House and personalize your characters and mascots.

name: Wanaka Farm
description: Players are randomly assigned when starting the game, players can renovate, decorate and exchange with others. The NFT exchange market is the harvested items including farm, items, seeds, crops, livestock. Players will choose to buy seeds or pets or both to grow on their farm according to their preferences or the suitability of the environment they have for each species. Players can go to the market to buy decorative items and expand their farm. Players can combine seeds and pets to create new breeds according to their parents' genes. Harvested products from the farm will be owned by players in the form of digital assets on cyberspace or NFT tokens on blockchain.

name: Bulb Boy: Jar of Despair
description: There is no jam for dinner! Grandaparaffine asks Bulb Boy (´･_･`) to fetch a jar from the basement, which is the beginning of a creepy adventure.

name: Nazo to Kioku no Labyrinth: Somewhere, elsewhere
description: It is a game to solve the mystery hidden in the two worlds of manga and 3D and escape.

name: Eloquence
description: Can you save the villagers living on an active volcano? Make your way to the top while you're trying to learn and speak a language you don't understand.

name: Kakurenbo no Oto: Hidden Notes
description: Kakurenbo no Oto: Hidden Notes is a story game using augmented reality (AR). With a smartphone in hand, you're surrounded by darkness as you walk home. It's a hands-on game where you get to relive the story of the character in a unique way.

name: John Carter: Warlord of Mars
description: Sin descripción

name: Vapor World: Over the Mind
description:
To escape the twisted world, the boy begins his journey.

Vapor World is an action-adventure game that unfolds the inner world.

name: Project-Blemmyes
description: In this roguelite third-person shooter, control a consciousness inserted into a battle suit forced to defeat endless hordes of enemies as part of an experiment. The ultimate goal is to escape the experiment, but doing so will require determination, skill and countless deaths.

name: The Awakener: Risen
description: Set in a medieval fantasy world, Arise of Awakener is a third-person action-adventure game with a class system that gives players direct control in how they choose to fight. With three class choices - mages, archers, and warriors, the way players decide to fight the fantastical creatures which fill this world is entirely up to them. Battles are great spectacles in which players must use their abilities and weapons to overcome the trials and challenges they will face. Fight dragons, control flying airships, collect resources and explore the expansive world that Arise of Awakener offers

name: GoldfishFlap
description:
"You Got Caught On the Fishing Line!"

A goldfish wandering along the river was caught on a fishing line!
You'll have to be a goldfish and help go home!

But Goldfish Are Still Hung On the Fishing Line.
Resisting the manpower of the fishing line, let's pass through various topography and go home!

My Family Is Waiting At Home!

It Will Be Hard But Worthwhile!

You can control flapping goldfish with your mouse! Adventure the sea!

There are now 3 kinds of area(more area will be updated!)
Avoid the jellyfish and other predator-fishes(even meteoric stones under the sea !

Sea is Dangerous Place So It Can Suffer You..!
But Don't Give Up You Can Do It!

name: Road to Morrow
description: Road to Morrow is a narrative-driven puzzle adventure game set in a near future Europe devastated by the effects of climate change. Explore this new normal through Iris, a girl whose memory was erased by an unknown event and must survive working for a company that controls everything. Travel around different countries created in a unique art style that bring together 2D and 3D graphics. Complete your tasks and reveal all the secrets of a world which is closer that you think.

name: Forgotten Chain
description:
ForgottenChain is a massively multiplayer online role-playing game (MMORPG) set in a player-driven mysterious fantasy universe, the action takes place within three rival kingdoms (Xaetha, Taria, Drakary). The project offers players an immersive in-game environment with four playable character classes (Knight, Assassin, Warlock, Mage) and countless spells, abilities, and environments.

Get a champion, choose a kingdom to fight for, and set out into the mysterious world with your weapon, your mount, and your pet to prove your worth in the action-packed combat system by defeating monsters, bosses, and other players, or explore the world as a peaceful forager of goods and rares, establishing a reputation as a skilled refiner, miner, fisher, and craftsman.

In-game NFTs are obtained via rare monster drops and in-game events. ForgottenChain's NFTs aren't like the conventional "collectible card" NFTs that are so popular in crypto nowadays. Instead, they're useful and functioning NFTs that can be put into the Game Framework and turned into unique in-game objects. These NFTs can be purchased or sold in-game (auction houses, player marketplaces) as well as via third-party NFT exchanges outside of the game world.

name: Trickcal Revive
description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Dimensions: Cragger - Legends of Chima: Fun Pack

name: LEGO Dimensions: Doctor Who Fun Pack
description: At the center of the LEGO Multiverse lies an ancient planet that is inhabited by the evil mastermind, Lord Vortech. It is believed that the person who controls the Foundational Elements on which this planet is built will control all of the Multiverse. Vowing to become that ruler, Lord Vortech determines that by summoning characters from a variety of LEGO worlds, he'll be able to find the building blocks of the LEGO civilization. One day, a mysterious and powerful vortex appears in a variety of LEGO worlds, and different characters from DC Comics, The Lord of the Rings, The LEGO Movie and more are swept away. Noticing their friends are being taken, Batman, Gandalf and Wyldstyle jump into the vortex on a journey they never imagined. Now, realizing Lord Vortech's intentions, the three intrepid heroes must venture through space and time to save their friends and all of LEGO humanity.After you've saved the day, expand your LEGO Dimensions experience with this Dr. Who: Cyberman Fun Pack. Featuring 40 buildable pieces, this Fun Pack plunges you into another realm of the LEGO multiverse with a Cyberman and a Dalek.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Teen Titans Go! Team Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Dimensions: Gremlins Team Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Dimensions: Benny Fun Pack

name: LEGO Dimensions: Cyborg Fun Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Dimensions: Bane Fun Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Dimensions: Wonder Woman Fun Pack
description:
This LEGO Dimensions Wonder Woman (DC Comics) Fun Pack (Universal) makes a fun addition to a fan's collection. It includes a full-color Wonder Woman figure and an assortment of pieces that assemble to form her iconic invisible jet. This kids' building toy set is recommended for ages 7 to 14.

LEGO Dimensions Fun Pack includes:
Wonder Woman
Invisible jet

name: LEGO Dimensions: Krusty the Clown Fun Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Dimensions: Laval - Legends of Chima: Fun Pack
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Dimensions: Green Arrow Polybag
description: Sin descripción

name: LEGO Dimensions: Unikitty Fun Pack
description: Journey through a multiverse of rainbows, puppies and much more with Unikitty from The Lego Movie! Bring a hop, skip and a dance to the crazy mash-up multiverse of Lego Dimensions with Unikitty. Build and place this half unicorn, half animé kitten on the Lego Toy Pad and watch her spring to life in the game. Then activate her special Rainbow Lego Objects, Master Build and Big Transform abilities to solve puzzles and defeat those destructive enemies. Go mobile with the Cloud Cuckoo Car and rebuild it into the X-Stream Soaker and Rainbow Cannon for upgraded in-game powers!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Adventure Time Team Pack
description: What the jug?! Lumpy Space Princess and Jake the Dog are ready to embark on an adventure in the Lego Dimensions Multiverse! Get ready for fun in the Adventure Time Adventure World and Battle Arena with extra-awesome abilities like Slurp Access, Grapple Swing and Shape Shift. When you need to take off in a hurry, jump into the Lumpy Car or have BMO give you a lift. Then rebuild the Lumpy Car into the Lumpy Truck and Lumpy Land Whale, and BMO into DOGMO and SNAKEMO.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Finn the Human Level Pack
description: Help Finn the Human on his mission to find the Enchidrion and prove to Princess Bubblegum that he’s a hero! Battle foes as you travel through the Forest of Mount Cragdor, the Dark Magician’s Brain World, and more in this exclusive Adventure Time game level. Build Finn and use one of his many special swords to cut vines, grapple, and even deflect lasers! When he’s stuck and in need of a lift, add the rebuildable Jakemobile and Ancient War Elephant into the game. Rebuild the Jakemobile into Snail Dude Jake and Hover Jake, and the Ancient War Elephant into the Cosmic Squid and Psychic Submarine to blast your way through enemies and tackle trickier puzzles. Unlock the Adventure Time Adventure World and challenge friends in the Pillow World Battle Arena.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Bart Simpson Fun Pack
description: Let creativity be your guide to a building and gaming adventure – journey through unexpected worlds and team up with unlikely allies on a quest to defeat the evil Lord Vortech. Build mischievous Bart, and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to launch him into the game in a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Activate Bart's Target and Mini Access abilities to solve puzzles and battle enemies. When things get tough, send in his awesome Gravity Sprinter that rebuilds into a Street Shredder or Sky Clobberer for extra in-game powers.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Bad Cop Fun Pack
description: Let creativity be your guide to a building and gaming adventure – journey through unexpected worlds and team up with unlikely allies on a quest to defeat the evil Lord Vortech. Build Bad Cop and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his special Laser, Target and Relic Detector abilities to solve puzzles and battle enemies. When he needs backup, call in the Police Car and rebuild it into an Aerial Squad Car and Missile Striker for upgraded in-game powers!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Adventure Time Fun Pack
description: Keep the Adventure Time party rocking in the Lego Dimensions multiverse with Marceline the Vampire Queen! Build and place the Marceline minifigure on the Lego Toy Pad to send her into the game with her Sonar Smash and Bolt Deflector abilities, using the Marceline Axe Guitar. Activate her Telekinesis and Teleport skills to make your way through the Adventure Time Adventure World and Battle Arena. Build and use Marceline’s Lunatic Amp to make some noise, and rebuild it into the Shadow Scorpion and Heavy Metal Monster when you need even more power.

name: LEGO Dimensions: The Joker and Harley Quinn Team Pack
description: Get devious with The Joker and Harley Quinn from DC Comics! Place the mischievous DC Comics villains The Joker and Harley Quinn on the Lego Toy Pad to launch them into the Lego Dimensions multiverse. Use their weapons and activate their powerful special abilities to battle enemies and solve exciting puzzles. When things get tough, send in The Joker's Chopper and Harley's Quinn-mobile. Rebuild The Joker's Chopper into a Mischievous Missile Blaster and The Joker's Lock 'n' Laser Jet. Rebuild Harley's Quinn-mobile into a Quinn Ultra Racer and Missile Launcher. Activate The Joker's special Grappler, Target, Hazard and Electricity abilities, and Harley Quinn's Acrobat and Super Strength abilities to solve puzzles and battle enemies.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Ninjago Team Pack
description: Build Cole and Kai and place them on the Lego Toy Pad to bring them to life in the exciting Lego Dimensions multiverse. Use their golden Ninja weapons, unleash their Spinjitzu skills and activate other special abilities to overpower any enemy who stands in their way. Call in Cole's awesome 3-in-1 Boulder Bomber and Kai's 3-in-1 Blade Bike and rebuild them for upgraded in-game abilities!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Nya Fun Pack
description: Let creativity be your guide to a building and gaming adventure – journey through unexpected worlds and team up with unlikely allies on a quest to defeat the evil Lord Vortech. Build this skilled Ninja hero and add her to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place Nya on the Lego Toy Pad to bring her to life in the game, then activate her special Spinjitzu, Acrobat, Stealth and Laser Deflector abilities to solve puzzles and take down rivals. Use the Samurai Mech to defeat rivals and rebuild it into a Samurai Shooter and Soaring Samurai Mech for upgraded in-game powers!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Zane Fun Pack
description: Let creativity be your guide to a building and gaming adventure – journey through unexpected worlds and team up with unlikely allies on a quest to defeat the evil Lord Vortech. Build Zane and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his special Acrobat, Spinjitzu, Stealth, Boomerang, Dive and X-Ray Vision abilities to solve puzzles and put the freeze on enemies. When he needs to fly, take off in the NinjaCopter and rebuild it into a Glaciator and Freeze Fighter for upgraded in-game powers!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Lloyd Fun Pack
description: Join Lego Ninjago Lloyd on a Lego Dimensions mission! Build this famed Ninja, place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, and add him to an exciting mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Use Lloyd's two golden katanas and activate his special Spinjitzu, Illumination, Acrobat, Stealth, Laser Deflector and Stealth abilities to solve puzzles and take on enemies in true ninja style! When it's time to take the battle to the sky, launch Lloyd's Golden Dragon and rebuild it into a Sword Projector Dragon and Mega Flight Dragon for upgraded in-game powers!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Eris - Legends of Chima: Fun Pack
description: Team up with Eris from Lego Chima to outsmart the competition! Join Chima's tactical warrior in a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Build and place the Eagle Princess on the Lego Toy Pad to launch her into the game, then activate her special Super Strength, CHI, Target and Flying abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. Send in the Eagle Interceptor to help her on her quest and rebuild it into an Eagle Skyblazer and Eagle Swoop Diver for upgraded in-game powers!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Starfire (Teen Titans Go!) Fun Pack
description: Get ready to save the day with the quirkiest, sassiest and sweetest alien of all! Join Starfire in the Dimensions multiverse and place this secret weapon on the Toy Pad. Unleash her powerful green energy blast to kiss the bad guys good-bye in her crime-fighting adventures. With the abilities to interact with Rainbow bricks and regain health quickly in battle, no one can put Starfire down. Access the Teen Titans Go! Adventure World in Jump City and explore several psychedelic areas from the Titans Tower to Wacka Doodles Amusement Park! Dive into the exclusive Battle Arena and take Starfire’s fire green orbs to the test for bigger possibilities against your family and friends. Hop onto the Titan Robot for a roller-coaster fun-filled adventure and then rebuild the Titan Robot into the T-Rocket or Robot Retriever for an even more supercharged adventure with the rest of the Titans gang! Watch the exclusive Teen Titans Go! episode to discover how this vibrant team of teenage superheroes banded together as they stumbled upon the multiverse where they encounter new adventures and friends along the way.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Doctor Who Level Pack
description: The Doctor has discovered a hidden message in the TARDIS memory banks… from his future self! Help The Doctor in his daring bid to rewrite the future and save the day! Build The Doctor, attach him to the Lego Toy Tag and place him on the Lego Toy Pad to see him come to life in the game. Activate his special Hacking, Technology, Fix-it and Doctor Regenerate abilities to help him solve in-game puzzles and defeat menacing enemies. And when it's time to give him a helping hand, send in the rebuildable 3-in-1 TARDIS and K-9!

name: LEGO Dimensions: Legolas Fun Pack
description: Protect the multiverse with Elven Prince Legolas from The Lord of the Rings! Build Legolas and take him on a Lego Dimensions adventure through a mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters. Place him on the Lego Toy Pad to transport him into the game, then activate his special Pole Vault, Target and Acrobat abilities to crack puzzles and fend off foes. Use his Arrow Launcher to help him on his journey and rebuild it into a Seeking Shooter and Triple Ballista for upgraded in-game powers!

name: Hungry Hearts Diner 2: Moonlit Memories
description:
In Hungry Hearts Diner 2, be the boss of a small eatery in a quiet
corner of 1960's Tokyo. This casual restaurant management sim
comes jam-packed with stories, and you'll have a chance to both
catch up with old friends and meet new faces.

Grandma's back with an all-new diner location but the same
delicious cooking...and a few new recipes, to boot!
Taste popular classics like curry, ramen, and miso soup, but
don't forget to browse our selection of more retro and traditional
Japanese foods like natto, nikujaga, and okonomiyaki as well.
We've got a huge selection of tasty treats, and yes, even the
undisputed emperor of Showa sweets—fruit parfait!

But you're not just here for the food, right?
...Right?

Okay, you are, but so is everyone, at first.
Stay awhile, however, and Grandma's garrulous manner
will soon have you as chatty as her other regulars.
They're an odd bunch, and they all seem to have their
share of troubles. But after the third bowl of miso soup or so,
they'll open up and reveal their stories, both joyous and sad.

Strap in for an all-new set of tales, with some surprising
twists and turns along the way. And remember, everyone's
got that one special meal they can just never forget.

name: LEGO Dimensions: Sensei Wu Fun Pack
description: Become one with Spinjitzu Master Sensei Wu! Build Sensei Wu and add him to a crazy mash-up multiverse of your favorite characters! Place him on the Lego Toy Pad to bring him to life in the game, then activate his special Acrobat, Spinjitzu, Stealth and Pole Vault abilities to solve puzzles and defeat enemies. When he needs to fly, take off in the Flying White Dragon to boost your gameplay, and rebuild it into a Golden Fire Dragon and Ultra Destruction Dragon for upgraded in-game powers!

name: The Legend of the Spirit Bird
description: An evil spirit has thrown the ancient forest into disarray. Search for the long-lost magical masks of the forest's protectors and help restore the balance in this eerie adventure. For young and adult dreamers alike.

name: Arran: The Book of Heroes
description: Arran: The Book of Heroes is an action TopDown Hack & Slash cooperative multiplayer game, set in a fantasy world where mighty heroes rise and fight hordes of enemies to restore peace in a war ravaged land.

name: Carpoon
description: What happens when you fuse a harpoon gun to a tow truck? Twin-stick car harpooning arcade party action! Harpoon and reel cars in, then tow them into the recycling crusher before time runs out and while watching out for other hazards.

name: Mekanin
description: An 1v1 online fighting game from Hazuki_games in Japan.

name: Clash Mini
description: A strategic board game set within the Clash universe where players position their favorite characters and watch them come to life for battle!

name: RLLL: Tower of Choices
description: Rolalala is Rogue-like-like-like game.

name: Shovel Escape
description: A vertical platformer in which you traverse up falling rocks and teleport with your magical shovel, to reach the top and escape before the lava gets you from below.

name: X
description:
X was first showed as a tech demo for the Super Nintendo Entertainment System, before starting development on the Game Boy. This version has colored graphics.
The game would later become the first Star Fox.

name: Supersonic Rhyme Chamber
description: Supersonic Rhyme Chamber (aka SRC) is a VR rap & rhythm game where you are dropped into a world that is ruled by rhyme and flow, and you must learn the ways of hip-hop to make your way back home! Rap battle your way through colorful lands as you encounter strong rivals and the dopest of friends. As you improve your skills and collect all the keys, will you be able to become a legendary MC?

name: Emergency Monster Team
description: Nadel is a Berserker Paramedic who is headed back to work after the events of the "Pipe Man" took place in the monster city of Dendsville. The city is on high alert, so the hospital director has asked her to work inside for the evening. She’s tasked with helping the staff and patients.

name: Claw Arena
description: Claw Arena is an arena action game for mobile devices featuring unique one-finger controls. Select one of 8 animal warriors with distinct movesets and fight your way through the Arena tournament to become the champion! Customize your warrior with unlockable outfits and upgradeable equipment to fit your playstyle.

name: Danny Fisher Kills the Government
description: Danny Fisher Kills the Government is a satirical political video game, taking the player through the journey of Danny Fisher, as he and a party of local New Yorkers foster community, tussle with the NYPD, girl-bosses, CEOs, and Mayor de Blasio himself.

name: 1000 Deaths
description: 1000 Deaths is a 3D adventure platformer about interpersonal conflicts and the effects of the media. Play fast-paced episodes and discover wildly different endings with each play through. Switch perspectives from a pool of eclectic characters, making decisions that you'll take with you to the grave.

name: Tsukihime: The Other Side of Red Garden
description: The second half of Tsukihime -A piece of blue glass moon-.

name: Save the Pirate: Sea Story - Ice Age
description: An adventure game about a funny pirate and the Ice Island with logic tasks. The player has two options for the development of events, from which you need to choose the right one, guided by logic.

name: Regiment of Armour
description: Fast reaction and strategic plans and laying traps are the cornerstone achieving victory in Regiment of Armor. Overcome the odds PvPvE against other players, zombies and soldiers. Start with teams or form them along the way, the rules of war are up to you to decide.

name: Super Dungeon Bros: Broettes
description: Grab The Broettes Character Pack, featuring a hit squad of frighteningly feisty females set to wreak havoc throughout Rokheim! Jet, Lita, Patti and Nyx are a fearsome foursome, hell bent on restoring the long rock stars of old!

name: World of Pets
description: Go in search of pets who have escaped from the shelter, help them find a new home and find friends. An interesting journey full of adventures and unexpected encounters awaits you.

name: Try to Survive!
description: Try to Survive! - is an endless game where the player have to survive and kill creatures that want to kill him. At the same time, improving skills will affect the style of his game. The goal is to survive as long as possible and reach the best score.

name: Inside Light
description: The city of police and bandits playing hide and seek, ghost's adventure, ghost's challenge, ghost's cooperation, and ghost's competition.

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - Flying the Jolly Roger
description: In this expansion you will learn what it truly means to be a pirate! Make friends with the most wanted criminals of the Caribbean, plunder cities, make a name for yourself, face a people's avanger and pay an ultimate price for all your crimes!

name: DodgeBall VR
description: The Year is 3020 & Earths way of life has changed forever from the way we know it. Individuals are competing for freedom through your favorite childhood game, Dodgeball...

name: Anime: World War II - Nazi Zombies
description: Enemies now became even more strong and deadly. Will you be able to keep up with them?

name: HighQ Quiz
description: A simple quiz game with multiple ways to play. Simple and fun

name: Genius Greedy Mouse: Greedy of XOR
description: 16 new big levels with pure puzzle mazes, all heavy inspirated from the original XOR classic.

name: Super Army of Tentacles 3: The Search for Army of Tentacles 2 - XPack II: Call of Koithulhu
description: Save Halloween in this new quest pack! Complete with two new quests and two new outfit packs (each with a Halloween outfit for every party member)!

name: Unhack: Destruction
description: Return to cyberspace for 3 more missions in the Unhack: Destruction DLC, this time centered around Ms Director and her AI duo!

name: True or False: Owl Rescue
description: Adventure awaits! All-new campaign featuring 50 facts and introducing a new animal companion - a wise owl.

name: Paralax VR Aim Trainer
description: Paralax VR Aim Trainer is a program designed to help you achieve the best performance in a wide variety of VR games though structured scenarios focusing of the core aspects of aim development (Aiming, Flicking, Tracking and Reaction time) with data to track and support progression

name: Ravished Realms
description: You've been invited! Follow your classmates in this Visual Novel as they show you around the VR MMORP everyone's been talking about! The only problem? Nina may not be able to handle how attractive her party is!

name: Hamster Logic 3D
description: Think hard and use your hamster logic to solve the geometric puzzles in this fun and fluffy game!

name: Sweet Bitcoin
description: Have fun playing Sweet Bitcoin and cash out REAL Bitcoin! Not only is this match-three mobile game fun to play, you will get rewarded with Bling Points that can be exchanged for Bitcoin. The amount you receive will be very small, but the more you play, the more you will earn!

name: Master Boy
description: "Master Boy" is a happy-paced cartoon casual role-playing game with Chinese cuisine as the theme. Players can accept tasks in charming urban areas, help friends defend farm and beach, exterminate invaders and collect ingredients to get rewards and improve their own attributes. Just enjoy it.

name: Sea Dogs: To Each His Own - The Final Lesson
description: This pack of six new adventures tells a story of captain de Maure's first months in the Caribbean. New World has new rules and those who want to conquer it must learn it's final lesson.

name: Lords of Football: United States
description: Now you can play the USA league. Play the USA National League (includes playoff). Taste of the USA – The USA comes with modified building backgrounds; reflecting their real world architectural style.

name: Jewels of the Mysterious Woodland: Mountains & Clouds Jewel Match
description: Mountains & Clouds Jewel Match - The new match 3 game is here, with brilliant jewels in over 600 dazzling puzzles! A magical journey filled with waves of excitement and brilliant visuals! Swap jewels to clear the way, and match pieces to crush each challenge that lies ahead.

name: Powamo
description: Have Fun fighting with your Powamo in the Fantasy Arena.

name: Miracle Snack Shop: Philia After Story
description: Find out what happens to Philia and our main character as they begin their new lives!

name: Jake's Paralysis
description: Animated Visual Novel in which you follow Jake through his romantic and student life evolution, making decisions that will impact how the story ends. This game has content unsuitable for children or those who are easily disturbed.

name: Sphere Invasion
description: Sphere Invasion is Sci-Fi Tower Defence. Build your own road and defend it with 7 unique towers.

name: SnowFighters
description: Make snowball and Throw to the rivals!! Snowball fight e-sports action game !!

name: Outrevenge
description: A Top-Down Cyberpunk Action-Adventure. Lead a Military Special Missions Unit in a battle against deadly lifeforms.

name: Myriad: A Rogue Adventure
description: Myriad is an Action-Adventure game with Roguelite elements. Play as a new character each run, loot tons of weapons, and fight hordes of enemies in a randomly generated world.

name: WC
description: Hospital. Today, a lot of visitors. Among them there is a small boy with a bladder problem. Suddenly, he longed to the toilet. The main thing is not to be mistaken the door.

name: Centurion Rex
description: Command legions of dinosaur-riding roman riflemen in this historically accurate RTS.

name: Time Travel Shanty
description: Jump back and forth through time to explore maze-like ruins, dodge the attacks of undead guardians, loot their treasures and defeat tough bosses in this top-down, metroidvania inspired, action-platformer.

name: Shadow Ninja: Apocalypse - Endless Runner
description: Endless version randomly choosed levels. Stay on the platform as long as you can, on your way there will be many obstacles and rogue ninja's. Dodge these obstacles to increase your score.

name: Secret of the Magic Crystals: The Race
description: The Secret of the Magic Crystals: The Race is a multiplayer expansion for the original game which allows to race with your favourite horse against players around the world or the computer. Ride your horses from the main game and ace on three different tracks. Special power-ups will aid you to win!

name: End Up
description: End Up Demo Story is Based on an Agent, Veer Who is Going on a Mission to Save the Human Life's. But this will not be Easy Task for Him. Because Unexpecting Difficulties are will be there for Him On His Way.

name: Afghanistan '11: Royal Marines
description: Royal Marines brings back the winning formula of Afghanistan ’11 and innovates on it with plenty new features. A new campaign, a new faction, plenty new units, civilian vehicles, car bombs, roadblocks, Afghan police…

name: Theogony: Crystal Water Blue
description: A monster taming game crossed with tactical grid based combat and open exploration.

name: Retro War
description: Retro War is a 2D shooting videogame. In this game you must pilot a ship, dodge obstacles and enemy ships to finally reach your destination and move to the next level.

name: Tales of Escape: Illusion (VR)
description: Trapped inside your own mind, inside your own dream! Your guard is gone for 2 hours and you have to find the antidote and return to reality so you can escape!

name: Earth Defense Force 4.1: The Shadow of New Despair - Sting Shot
description: A new shotgun developed for use against giant creatures. For that purpose, it uses special bullets designed to penetrate several thick, oversized hides without missing a beat.

name: Alone
description: Alone is a puzzle platformer where you control more than just one character. Switch control between a variety of bots, each with their own unique features, to help overcome increasingly more difficult challenges.

name: Vampire: The Masquerade - Night Road: Usurpers and Outcasts
description: "Usurpers and Outcasts" unlocks the options to play as Tremere and Caitiff.

name: Button Lock
description: Navigate through a series of intricate—or possibly incredibly simple—mazes. But beware, as you are only given a certain number of moves to work with. You must make the most of your surroundings and discover unconventional pathways in order to proceed in this head-scratching puzzle game.

name: Tunnel Vision
description: Tunnel Vision is a Retro Space shooter that harkens back to the early 80s Arcades. Fun simple addictive gameplay.

name: Sapper
description: In Sapper, you play a small anti-pirate. mine-sapper unit. Cleanse local home vessels and exotic alien craft of enemies, mines, and watch vast ships ride to safety as you collect your bounty.

name: Craft & Survive
description: Are you ready to survive in a zombie apocalypse world with your friends? Virus is spreading in the open world and undead zombies are everywhere. Now you need to use all your survival and shooting skills to stop them! Prepare yourself for FPS game - Craft & Survive.

name: Gold Rush: The Game - Frankenstein Machinery
description: Attention, attention! Gold prospectors from all plots, unite! The large delivery is heading towards the Shop with Heavy Equipment. You will find machines that will change the concept of gold mining.

name: Life of Ocean
description: In life of ocean, you will start from a desert island.you must do what you can to survive.when you don't need to worry about food or clothing, there are countless treasures waiting for you under the ocean.take the Treasure Map you found, camposs and shovel, become the richest adventurer!

name: Game Tengoku CruisinMix Special: Homura Banto
description: Homura Banto joins the team from Jaleco's classic baseball series: Bases Loaded. A new character, exclusive music track and new entry to the Data Mode HD library are yours to enjoy!

name: Tankocracy
description: Tankocracy is a tank tactical Top-Down shooter inspired by games like Desert Strike and Battletech on Mega Drive. You'll lead your mercenary company to the success by completing hardcore contracts.

name: Gretchen: Queen of Crows
description: Gretchen: Queen of Crows is a 2D Action/Adventure that follows Gretchen and Baldrek the crow. Use Gretchen's gift of fire, and Baldrek's magic abilities to jump, glide, dash, and battle through beautifully twisted and fairy-tale-like fantasy environments full of demonic folk-lore inspired creatures.

name: Steel Division: Normandy 44 - Back to Hell
description: Steel Division: Normandy 44 - Back to Hell is bringing a whole new realm of gameplay to one of 2017’s biggest RTS titles.

name: Knockout League: Heavy Bag
description: Introducing the newest Knockout League training game, the Heavy Bag! In this new training game, you will target different areas on the Heavy Bag with vicious combinations of punches as Doug tests your accuracy, speed, power, and endurance. Keep your workout towel handy, you’ll be working up a sweat!

name: Space Fox Kimi: A Very Kimi Christmas
description: It's that time of year where humans celebrate the special holiday known as "Christmas". This year however, is different. It is the first year that mankind has a group of special guests from another world. What will the visitors from the Galactic Foxian Empire do in this holy night?

name: Polaris Sector: Lumens
description: The Lumens expansion pack will bring brand new features to the overall game, like new race-specific sciences, ships role assignment and updated planets properties, for an enhanced gameplay experience!

name: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki I KAI - Thors Military Academy 1204
description: The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki role-playing game series is highly acclaimed by gamers all over the world for its elaborate character portrayals and epic storyline. The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki and The Legend of Heroes: Sen no Kiseki II have sold over 1 million copies in total.

name: The Chaos Gene
description: The Chaos Gene is a Indie casual fighting game. Inspired by some of the classic fighting games I grew up playing in the arcades.

name: Darkened Glory
description: Darkened Glory is an epic fantasy action game where each player fights for glory of a darkened age in a mythical land.

name: Ungeon
description: Fight your way through a cursed dungeon filled to the brim with undead enemies in hopes of finding your lost father, or at least your way out. Ungeon is a randomly generated dungeon crawler with a large focus on combat and exploration.

name: Amnon's Beginning
description: A battle that commends for the mind, will the mind be successful or unsuccessful in maintaining it's stability? Build your settlement and fight off the invader of this spiritual realm with real-time strategy.

name: Christmas Movie Bingo
description: Prepare to take your Christmas movie night to the next level of fun with Chrismas Movie Bingo. See if you can spot enough Chrismas film tropes to get 5-in-a-row!

name: Batla: Tank
description: Tank DLC give access to most massive class of robots, Tank! This race is considered to be tough and brutal. He is bigger than the rest, he has more health and armor, but he is slower. His ability, Charge, compensates for this feature. Skillful player will be able both to run away and to catch up the enemy using this ability.

name: Tora Tora!
description: Tora Tora! is an air combat simulator, based on the conflict of the Pacific Ocean in WW2. An Indie development that aims to bring the player to live the experience of those pilots. through intuitive game dynamics and a special graphic style.

name: Crusader's Dynasty
description: Crusader's Dynasty is a medieval/fantasy battle royale and Capture the flag game where you can play as different champions, kill bosses and find better loot.

name: The Book of the Game
description: A turn-based open-world RPG, based loosely on the books of the same name.

name: Blood & Gold: Caribbean! - The Zombiest Adventures
description: What would happen if a zombie apocalypse had occurred in 1650? Controlling a small group of survivors, you will have to do road robbery, hunt for gunpowder and constantly search for food. Welcome to The Zombiest Adventures!

name: Eternal Dreamers: Anna, the Blood Driver
description: Wake Anna from her slumber to make her powerful abilities your own! Consumed by a deep blood lust, Anna feeds on the life of your foes while replenishing her own.

name: Airport Simulator 3: Day & Night
description: The airport is a place that never sleeps. With departures, arrivals and the continuous hustle and bustle of passengers, there is rarely an opportunity for a break.

name: VR Black Hole Travel Hypothesis
description: In this VR Black Hole Travel Hypothesis game, you can have an immersive experience to travel through a black hole. What kind of unknown world did you reach after crossing? Start your adventure.

name: AEther Heist
description: Plunder magic from the anonymously-owned public internet in this Roguelite Twin-Stick Shooter. Use the essence you steal to research new weapons or augment the ones you already have, to better battle against the network defenses and steal even more power.

name: Street Karate: 2
description: New character, a new mission and lots of new enemies. In this sequel of Street Karate you will make good use of your fighting skills.

name: Traphouse Druglord
description: A drug dealer simulator. Deal with paying rent. Buying supplies. Police, rival gangs trying to rob you, while buying and making drugs to sell them and fund this plan to get to paradise.

name: Wildfall
description: Explore new islands, find hidden treasures and fight off a huge variety of different monsters. Help the once in peace living island dwellers regain control over a huge area what once belonged to them in this First-Person-Coop RPG!

name: Space Nations: Battlearena
description: A Space Nations: Battlearena is a video-game that blends the survival, space simulator, and scavenging elements with last-man-standing gameplay.

name: Divinity: Original Sin II - Definitive Edition: Companion - Sir Lora the Squirrel
description: Sir Lora is a squirrel fleeing the Knights of Drey - an apocalyptic order of furry knights who believe in the coming of the Great Acorn. He’ll join you in Fort Joy (along with his undead cat mount).

name: Massage Salon Story: Spring Breeze
description: Customers of all personalities are waiting for you here. You can tempt your customers with different massage techniques and positions to satisfy their desires. Of course, it is important to work hard to earn money. So Work hard and enjoy the life!

name: RoboDo
description: RoboDo is a singleplayer/multiplayer VR puzzle game with plenty exciting features. Bunch of levels for you to complete, some are fast, reaction based and others will make you concentrate and think. Beat levels alone or join your friend for some Co-Op action!

name: Shadows of Adam: Guild of the Artificers
description: Thrilling Battle Arena, Artifact Crafting, New Game Plus, and a new super optional dungeon! All complete with tons of new items and artifacts. Are you up for the challenge? This exciting DLC pack to Shadows of Adam awaits you!

name: Zeliria Sanctuary: Rise of Pumpkins
description: More adventures of Special Forces soldier Maxx on a distant planet Zeliria.

name: The Devil's Luck
description: A psychological horror experience situated in an apartment, with puzzles and scares to mess with your mind, alongside therapeutic rain sounds!

name: Senko no Ronde 2: Rounder Lili
description: Use Lili and her rounder, Brinsta, in Arcade, Online and Offline Battle modes.

name: Siege Up!
description: A classical full-featured RTS in low-poly style. Fantasy story-driven campaign, multiplayer, editor, cooperative missions. Build a city, walls, research technologies, capture resources to obtain advantage. Attack an opponent with melee, rangers, siege weapon and battle ships and come to VICTORY!

name: Conjuntalia: MecaEnglish
